content:
_From [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/) on February 19, 2012 15:01:07_

Avacynian Priest's ability is only supposed to tap non-Human creatures. It seems to tap any non-Human *permanent* -- specifically, in my testing, it was able to tap a Plains, an Ajani's Mantra, and a Scepter of Dominance, but not an Accorder Paladin or another Avacynian Priest.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=163_
